description: Check connectivity to MVIP and SVIP.

username.description: Please ensure that the user has the adequate permissions. For more information, please read the official documentation U(https://goo.gl/ddJa4Q).

skip.description: Skip checking connection to SVIP or MVIP.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the SolidFire cluster.

svip.description: Optionally, use to test connection of a different SVIP. This is not needed to test the connection to the target cluster.

mvip.description: Optionally, use to test connection of a different MVIP. This is not needed to test the connection to the target cluster.
